JOB.DESCRIPTION: This job deletes Control-M conditions older than 15 days.

JOB.CMDLINE: cd /home/prodcon/ctmagent/ctm/proclog/; find . -type f -print | wc -l; find /home/prodcon/ctmagent/ctm/proclog/ -type f -exec rm -f {} \; ; sleep 3; find . -type f -print | wc -l

JOB.DESCRIPTION: removes any wf_rename_myFiles listings older than 7 days from the sysout directory.
JOB.CMDLINE: cd /appdata/wfauto/ctmagent/ctm/sysout/; ls | wc; find -type f -name 'wf_rename_myFiles.*' -mtime +7 -exec rm -f {} \; ;ls | wc

JOB.DESCRIPTION: This job adds a year of days to ANSC01.DW_DATE, beginning with the latest date.
Testing pass through credentials
Testing shouts

This is a script to kill off the OLIB SIP2 servers each night, they will be respawned shortly after by the FD Controller. This is to workaround a problem whereby the SIP servers, over time, are chewing up all the memory on the database server, since they manage to develop an unmanageably large heap stack when left running for several days/weeks.
